Title: Moon Over Bourbon Street
Writer: Julie Plec (created by), Michelle Paradise, Christopher Hollier, Michelle Paradise (executive story editor), Charlie Charbonneau (story editor), L.J. Smith (based in part on the character Klaus from "The Vampire Diaries" novels by), Marguerite MacIntyre (staff writer)
Actors: Joseph Morgan, Daniel Gillies, Phoebe Tonkin, Charles Michael Davis
Plot: Elijah is taking control of the quarter and receives a surprising offer, and they know how to throw a party.
